column1: #text=My sons Todd 's hair seemed to grow at an exceptionally fast rate compared to other four year olds .
#text=It seemed as if every single week he needed a hair cut .
#text=He would fret every time he knew we were going and even threw tantrums .
#text=But once we get there things seemed to be smoother with him .
#text=We would grab a seat and wait for our favorite barber to get an opening .
#text=As soon as he did Todd would run up to him and sit in the chair knowing he would get ice cream if he sat still .
#text=The barber draped a piece of plastic around Todd 's shoulder so that hair would n't get on his clothes .
#text=The sound of the hair clippers tiny motor always had my boy on edge but he always sticks it out like a champ .
#text=Fifteen minutes later a brand new child walks out of the barber shop ; clean shaven and ready for a cool yummy treat .
